name: Murder Mystery in a masnison house
about: Solve the mystery from the clues given. Either a sucide or murder

name: Balance Yourself
about: We will construct a suspension bridge over a ground, participants are allowed to walk over the bridge by balancing themselves, the one who reaches the destination in less time will be the winner

name: Haunted House
about: The room will be kept dark and divided into different sets. Each set consists of different theme to scare the participants. The max time for each show is 4 mins. Different sets include different themes like graveyard setup, muddy path, etc
